channel.title: Westeros 317 - Dicing - PKP - Looking For Staff
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt]Westeros 317[/size]
Play NOW! - [url=http://www.westeros317.com/webclient/]http://www.westeros317.com/webclient/[/url] Forums! - [url=http://www.westeros317.com/forums/]http://www.westeros317.com/forums/[/url] Desktop client! - [url=http://www.westeros317.com/westeros317.jar]http://www.westeros317.com/westeros317.jar[/url]
- Oldschool 474 gameframe - Random casket drops from all NPC’s - Updated and revamped slayer system - Improved combat aspects (mainly PvP) - Statistic tracker to keep you counting - Global points store with rewards for minigames and PK’ing - Improved Jad boss fight (No previous waves) - Fully working and improved clan chat - All skillcapes, including construction and hunter - Randomly generated starter gearset - Client remembers username and password - Specifically tailored starter so you can jump right in - Stat and XP resetting and locking through NPC’s - Cash gambling system (don’t get too addicted!) - 100% implemented donator system - New and improved random event system - Experience lamps so random events are helpful - Ring of wealth/Cb brace/Regen brace - Crystal keys with random rewards
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4042605/real1.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4042607/real2.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4042610/real3.png[/img]
[size=14pt]23 Online ATM!![/size]
Not the best advertisement thread but you get the point guys![/center]

item.title: Westeros 317 - Dicing - PKP - Looking For Staff

item.description:
@audioscape wrote:

[center][size=36pt]Westeros 317[/size]

Play NOW! - http://www.westeros317.com/webclient/
Forums! - http://www.westeros317.com/forums/
Desktop client! - http://www.westeros317.com/westeros317.jar

  • Oldschool 474 gameframe
  • Random casket drops from all NPC’s
  • Updated and revamped slayer system
  • Improved combat aspects (mainly PvP)
  • Statistic tracker to keep you counting
  • Global points store with rewards for minigames and PK’ing
  • Improved Jad boss fight (No previous waves)
  • Fully working and improved clan chat
  • All skillcapes, including construction and hunter
  • Randomly generated starter gearset
  • Client remembers username and password
  • Specifically tailored starter so you can jump right in
  • Stat and XP resetting and locking through NPC’s
  • Cash gambling system (don’t get too addicted!)
  • 100% implemented donator system
  • New and improved random event system
  • Experience lamps so random events are helpful
  • Ring of wealth/Cb brace/Regen brace
  • Crystal keys with random rewards



[size=14pt]23 Online ATM!![/size]

Not the best advertisement thread but you get the point guys![/center]
